txt.en: 'Things aren't like they were years ago! You used to be able to trust people'
'People ought to be able to go to sleep without worrying that someone will come for you in the middle of the night.'
'All these people coming in from Archet...it must be an awful lonely place these days.'
'That Leecher Cartwell up on the hill is a good lad. He makes me up a salve for my achy knee.'
